law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Effective date" means the date that an eligible governmental unit commenced or commences participation in the Correctional Officers' Retirement System.
"Eligible governmental unit" means a governmental unit that is eligible to participate in the Correctional Officers' Retirement System under § 31-2B-02 of this subtitle.
"Local detention center officer" means an individual who works as a detention center officer for an eligible governmental unit.
"Local pension system" means a retirement or pension system established by the legislative body of an eligible governmental unit.
"State system" has the meaning stated in § 20-101(pp) of this article.
